title: AND THEN THERE WAS ANOTHER ONE
description: Deductive Logico was thrilled when he heard an old man had been killed on a secluded island. Of course, that was bad, but Logico had always wanted to solve one of those secluded island murders, and this was his big chance.

suspects.name: SIGNOR EMERALD
suspects.description: An Italian jeweler of great renown, Signor Emerald has traveled the world in search of rare, precious stones, which are always falling out of his pockets.

suspects.name: FATHER MANGO
suspects.description: He has taken a vow of poverty, but he drives a BMW. He's taken a vow of obedience, but he has a staff of twenty-five. He's taken a vow of chastity, too, which is why he's on vacation.

suspects.name: MISS SAFFRON
suspects.description: Gorgeous and charming, but maybe not all there in the brains department. Or maybe that's what she wants you to think. Or maybe she wants you to think that's what she wants you to think.

weapons.name: A BEAR TRAP
weapons.description: If you think it's too gruesome to use on a person, just think how the bears feel!

weapons.name: AN ORDINARY BRICK
weapons.description: Just a regular, ordinary brick. Nothing special. Just a brick.

weapons.name: A HARPOON
weapons.description: You could kill a fish with this. Or, honestly, you could kill anything with it.

locations.name: THE CLIFFS
locations.description: A long drop, but maybe the jagged rocks would break your fall.

locations.name: THE ANCIENT RUINS
locations.description: Some old standing stones with strange glyphs carved on them.

locations.name: THE DOCKS
locations.description: Old, rotten docks that have certainly seen better days. Look out for sharks!

clues: The suspect who brought an ordinary brick was a parishioner of Father Mango's.
Miss Saffron had a bear trap in her purse.
The suspect whose family's company produced Logico's magnifying glass was on the cliffs. (See Exhibit A.)
The ancient ruins seemed to hypnotize the hazel eyes of the suspect standing beside them.
By the time Logico got there, the old man's body had been nibbled on by sharks.
